info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 8 at 12:18PM CDT until May 9 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Tickfaw River at Liverpool affecting St. Helena Parish.
For the Tickfaw River...including Liverpool, Holden, Killian, Montpelier...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Tickfaw River at Liverpool.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Pastures and crop land adjacent to the river will flood. Rural areas near the river will be threatened with flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 100 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
